thread.title: City Snapshot: Waitrose weekly sales back on the rise
thread.title_full: City Snapshot: Waitrose weekly sales back on the rise

title: City Snapshot: Waitrose weekly sales back on the rise
text:
02 Oct 2015 | By Alec Mattinson 
Waitrose’s weekly sales (excluding petrol) were back up 2.1% in the week to 26 September after slipping for the previous two weeks, plus all the rest of this morning’s news from the City. Available to members only 
Learn more about our membership packages.
